title: Spirit of the Desert: Logo ID
content:
I give up on this one, any ideas on this gem?

Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014403im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logo1copy_4800.jpg)

 [‹ Farber-castell font needed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014403/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44998 "Go to previous forum topic") [Does anyone know what font this is? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014403/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45005 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Trick

comments.content:
Hi Patrick,

that’s a baaadly [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014403/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/squooshed) [Ondine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014403/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=ondine&x=0&y=0&sample_text=Spirit%20of%20the%20Desert&sample_size=48), by [Adrian Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014403/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Adrian%252BFrutiger).  
F
You know? it seems that the URW version doesn’t have the ‘E’ of this sample but [Adobe’s](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014403/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/ondine/) does.

Whew you guys are quick, many thanks

~P@
